name: Gun Beat
description: Beat enemies to the beat. Avoid bullets to survive. ‘Gun Beat’ is a VR game that combines rhythm and shooting. Beat the enemy with a rhythm! Oh, don't forget to avoid bullets, too!
minimum_requirements: OS: window 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4590 CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 600 MB available space
